org.springframework.core.serializer

Class DefaultSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.core.serializer.DefaultSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer<java.lang.Object>

    public class DefaultSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Serializer<java.lang.Object>
    A Serializer implementation that writes an object to an output stream using Java serialization.
    Since:
    3.0.5
    Author:
    Gary Russell, Mark Fisher

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public void serialize(java.lang.Object object,
                      java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the source object to an output stream using Java serialization. The source object must implement Serializable.
        Specified by:
        serialize in interface Serializer<java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        object - the object to serialize
        outputStream - the output stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of errors writing to the stream
        See Also:
        ObjectOutputStream.writeObject(Object)
